page.title: 11A CHILD'S SCHOOL DAY:FRIDAY
page.content: I get up in the morning at 8.00. I have a wash, get dressed and have my breakfast. Then I watch TV for a bit I go to school at 8.55. First we have register. Our first lesson is Reading 360 - it asks questions on cards about a story and there are puzzles in it. After that it is playtime,then Assembly. Maths is before dinner. We have two choices of meal. After dinner I go to Friday club with some other children and we sing with Miss Edwards and she plays her guitar. After that it is netball or topic. Then it is playtime again. After playtime we always have a story. Then we go home. I have my tea at 5.00. then I set off to church for choir rehearsal, from 6.30 to 7.00. I go home again and I have my supper then I watch TV. I go to bed at 10.00pm.
